jobDescription: Description:Job Summary  In this mission we are seeking a Software Engineer/Data Scientist to develop analytical models and algorithms in order to process different datasets to extract patterns and knowledge. This person will support operations, maintenance, and enhancements to existing tools to help correlate data analysis and the generation of business intelligence  Interested candidates must have more than intermittent exposure to mandatory skills and will support efforts that span the entire software development lifecycle.
